item.title: Inside the Base Where Israel Has Detained Thousands of Gazans
item.description: Inside the Base Where Israel Has Detained Thousands of Gazans Israeli soldiers stand guard at the Erez crossing between Israel and the Gaza Strip on July 16, 2018.

item.title: What Ukraine Has Lost
item.description: What Ukraine Has Lost Ukrainian soldiers stand guard at a checkpoint in the village of Shyrokyne, near the town of Mariupol, on Feb. 18, 2015. AP Photo/Evgeniy Maloletka
